text: Land uses, activities, and delivery z Development should consist of a mixed-use, residential-led scheme with a mix of retail, workspace, community and cultural uses and the provision of a primary school and health facility and an expansion of the Idea Store. z Acceptable land uses include: – Residential (Class C3) – maximum 75% of floorspace – Hotel (Class C1) – Town centre uses (Class E) – at least 25% of floorspace – Community uses (Class F1/F2) z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – Primary school
